title: Charmekkd
author: Charmekkd
content: we will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?

comments.author: tbterryboy
comments.body: My guess is that altcoins will also fall drastically and maybe some of them can't handle the impact so they will die (price plungest to zero) and cannot recover anymore but strong altcoins that are at the top can still hold on.We don't know what the future awaits on BTC but many of us are still optimistic and we think it will only go up and hit more all time highs therefore I don't think 10 dollars for BTC is possible anymore. That is only possible when BTC was still new and the adoption for it was still low but we have gone a long way already. At the moment, we are now close to the Bitcoin halving event and that will have a positive impact on the price of BTC.

comments.author: Unbunplease
comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwe will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?If bitcoin falls to $10, we cannot rule out the case that one of the altcoins will take its place and the other altcoins will become independent. It is also possible that in that case bitcoin will become similar to stablecoin. Therefore, I would not categorically state that if bitcoin falls to 10 dollars altcoins will die.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Unbunplease on March 12, 2023, 09:23:34 PMQuote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwe will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?If bitcoin falls to $10, we cannot rule out the case that one of the altcoins will take its place and the other altcoins will become independent. It is also possible that in that case bitcoin will become similar to stablecoin. Therefore, I would not categorically state that if bitcoin falls to 10 dollars altcoins will die.we are only talking theoretically here. because right now, that scenario is very far from happening. there's possibility that btc will indeed become obsolete in the future, and be replaced by a new one. we can't tell that yet. possibly that a new alt or new currency will be introduced to the humankind, who knows? but more then likely, a lot of alts already died at that point.

comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwhat will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?Who cares? 99.9% of them are going to zero no matter what will happend to bitcoin because they are scams made only to collect founds from investor, do pump and dump shame. The 10$ target for bitcoin is also a crazy idea. at that price 1 whale can buy every single coin and manipulate price as much as he wants (including pumping it back to 1 mln $).

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwhat will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?You have the idea I guess. When the price of bitcoin goes on high during the bull run, alts do come with it, right? And if bitcoin goes $10 soon, the price of altcoins are gonna be cheaper than what it is right now. But here's the thing when bitcoin drops to $10, there will be a lot of people that will be quick to buy those cheapest bitcoins in the market ever. They've seen it not just once not just twice but many times that it has recovered from its dump and that's why it's not gonna be a matter of price if that happens especially for bitcoin and, I think that the same scene might be created for some few altcoins that's also known.

comments.author: Digital_Lord
comments.body: The price of all altcoins are in coordination with Bitcoin's price if it rise then altcoins also enhances but as Bitcoin goes in dip all other altcoin also face some situations. So according to this relation if bitcoin become down the  surely altcoins will accommodate this changes in price but those tokens which have already lower price will become more in dip so as bitcoin reduces 10 dollars then already reduce tokens will completely loss their value and now it will be very difficult for those coins to return back to its original position.

comments.author: Zorigi
comments.body: In my opinion, if the bitcoin price drops to 10 dollars, of course that will be bad news for altcoins, because of course you can also imagine if that situation happened.because like this, for example, if bitcoin drops by 5%, sometimes altcoins can go down by up to 17%. so if that happens, the altcoin price will definitely be destroyed.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwe will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?I don't see this happening but if BTC price drops to $10 most of the Altcoins in the space would die naturally because they will be trading at Zero and the liquidity would dry out. Markt marker would suffer the most losses. BTC price currently is $25k and Ethereum is $1,600 so do the math, if BTC drops to $10 then Ethereum Ethereum would likely trade at $0.6 or less, so at what price would most of these Altcoins trade, Zero.

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwe will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?the worst case scenario is that the price of altcoins will be greatly crushed, and as far as I'm concerned none of the altcoins have their own price control, all depend on bitcoin so even if you are an altcoin investor, you also have to invest in bitcoin.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwe will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?In short, this whole experiment will be over if that happens.  I mean I'm sure bitcoincan fail and other projects continue on but in the near future I can't see that happening.  If people lose faith in bitcoin then I can't see why they wouldn't lose faith in all of crypto.  Can other projects thrive, yes they can but bitcoin at $10 would upend any progress crypto has make in the last 10-15 years.

comments.body: Quote from: Charmekkd on March 11, 2023, 11:29:13 PMwe will not know for the price of bitcoin in the future, and I just want to know what you think, about the question this time that I will ask you all, namely..what will happen to altcoins if btc price drops to 10 dollars?There will be no altcoins anymore if Bitcoin reach that price, imagine the dominance of Bitcoin over this market, that could also mean cryptocurrency are set to failed if Bitcoin goes to that level. comments.body: Altcoins will not survive, simple as that because that can be a worst market and a big crisis for sure and maybe many people will also not survive out of that crisis. Looking forward for the next five years of Bitcoin, I’m sure it will be a great market again.
